post.description: This method will returns all the instruction required to preform the deposit instruction. It takes amount as input to do the deposit, If all is provided as true , then all the amount in token-account will be considered for deposit. User wallet-address and fund_id is also required.

amount.description: Amount in Base Asset to deposit

all.description: If true, ignore amount and operate on the entire balance

program_id.description: The public key of the program to invoke

accounts.description: List of accounts involved in the instruction

pubkey.description: The public key of the account

is_signer.description: Indicates if this account is a signer

is_writable.description: Indicates if this account is writable

data.description: Instruction data as a list of bytes

success.description: Indicates if the transaction was successfully created
